title: PUMIE Toilet & Tile Pumice Cleaner, Pumice Stick with Handle, Multi-Function Toilet Bowl Cleaner by US Pumice, Bath-8, Pack of 2
features: PUMIE TOILET & TILE - Pack of 2 - A non-toxic cleaner preferred over chemicals as the best method to clean porcelain, ceramic tile, and similar hard surfaces. The light weight stone removes rust stains, hard water scale, stains, and other unwanted debris from most hard surfaces

PUMIE MULTI-FUNCTION TOILET BOWL CLEANER - Toilet & Tile pumice stones quickly remove hard water rings without damaging your toilet bowl. The stone is less dense than porcelain, making it the premiere option for removing toilet bowl rings and stains while protecting your toilet

HOW TO USE IT - Wet stick with water and rub directly on stain using a back and forth motion. Rinse to remove residue, or flush for toilet bowls. When finished, rinse stick in clear water and let dry before storage. Test in small sample area before cleaning if using on materials other than porcelain or ceramic tile Key Product Features

WHY IT WORKS - Pumice stone is less dense than porcelain so it is safe for your toilet. The stone is tougher than stains making it a top rated cleaning option. The stone also works great on grills, ceramic tile, and other hard surfaces

BONUS - Pumice is a multi-purpose cleaner for sinks, tubs, showers, floors, cast iron kitchenware, grills, tools, concrete, and more. 1 Bar measures 1.5x1.5x5 inches. 1 Piece US Pumice UPC Code 71132 00015
description: Pumie Toilet and Tile - Tile Pumice Cleaner with handle- Pack of 2. By United States Pumice Company. Make cleaning easier when you use this Pumie Toilet and Tile Cleaner. 1. Preferred over chemicals and cleansers as the most effective method to remove stains, including hard water rings from porcelain, ceramic tile and similar hard surfaces. 2. This multi-purpose cleaner can be used on sinks, tubs, showers, floors, cast iron kitchenware, grills, tools, concrete and other hard surfaces. 3. Removes rust stains, hard water scale, and stains and other unwanted debris. Can even be used on tile grout. 4. This professional-grade product is easy to use and is non-toxic. Will it scratch my toilet? No, the stone is softer than porcelain and ceramic tile, used as directed with water or liquid cleaner it is safe for your toilet. If concerned about scratching, test in a small inconspicuous area first such as the bottom of a toilet tank. Always use water or cleaning liquid with Toilet and Tile using moderate to light pressure. Is it non-toxic?. Yes, it is non-toxic making it a top rated household cleaning solution. It works alone or with water providing you with a cleaning solution, ideal for homes with pets or children. Is this a new product? No, United States Pumice Company has been producing pumice cleaners for 75 years. Tens of millions have been sold and they are used daily by commercial cleaners industry wide. Question: The stone reshapes and dissolves. Is it supposed to do that? Yes the stone will create a gray paste that helps to polish the surface being cleaned. It is engineered to be softer than porcelain surfaces so it breaks down with each use. Apply light to moderate pressure with water as a lubricant. 1 Piece US Pumice UPC Code 71132000152
